videos.description: Devron Harper goes 99 yards to the house on the kick return to cut Gardner-Webb's deficit to 14-7.
videos.headline: Gardner-Webb's Harper take off for 99-yard kick return TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Gardner-Webb's Harper take off for 99-yard kick return TD) 2019// ESHEET
